subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Kevin Garnett scored 23 points and the Boston Celtics improved to 10-0 at home with a 112-84 victory against the Toronto Raptors Friday night.
snippet: Kevin Garnett scored 23 points and the Boston Celtics improved to 10-0 at home with a 112-84 victory against the Toronto Raptors Friday night.
